titles.title: To provide for the conveyance of the Woodland Lake Park tract in Apache-Sitgreaves National Forest in the State of Arizona to the town of Pinetop-Lakeside, Arizona.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.

bill.summary: 7/31/1998--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey the Woodland Lake Park tract in Apache-Sitgreaves National Forest to the town of Pinetop-Lakeside, Arizona, for use as a public park and for other recreational purposes.
